<TABLE cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 class="t0">
<TR>
	<TD class="tr0 td0"><P class="p4 ft2">Requirement</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr0 td1"><P class="p5 ft2">Password reset frequency</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr1 td2"><P class="p6 ft3">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr1 td3"><P class="p6 ft3">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr2 td4"><P class="p4 ft2">Description</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr2 td5"><P class="p5 ft4">Network passwords, e.g. from a KPNNL domain account, and/or second</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr3 td4"><P class="p6 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr3 td5"><P class="p5 ft4">factor tokens may not be reset more than once every 4 hours. In case of an</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr3 td4"><P class="p6 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr3 td5"><P class="p5 ft4">emergency, or if the account needs to be reset sooner, the respective helpdesk</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr3 td4"><P class="p6 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr3 td5"><P class="p5 ft4">must be contacted.</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr1 td2"><P class="p6 ft3">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr1 td6"><P class="p6 ft3">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr2 td4"><P class="p4 ft2">Supplement</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr2 td7"><P class="p5 ft4">To prevent a user from resetting his or her password to the same value, by</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr3 td4"><P class="p6 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr3 td7"><P class="p5 ft4">quickly doing multiple password resets, a timer has been set. However when the</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr3 td4"><P class="p6 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr3 td7"><P class="p5 ft4">helpdesk is not available a user can still regain access to his or her account by</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr3 td4"><P class="p6 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr3 td7"><P class="p5 ft4">waiting.</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td2"><P class="p6 ft6">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td3"><P class="p6 ft6">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr0 td4"><P class="p4 ft2">ID</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr0 td5"><P class="p5 ft4"><NOBR>KSP-RE-250</NOBR></P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td2"><P class="p6 ft6">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td6"><P class="p6 ft6">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr2 td4"><P class="p4 ft2">Version</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr2 td7"><P class="p5 ft4">2.0</P></TD>

<TABLE cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 class="t0">
<TR>
	<TD class="tr0 td0"><P class="p4 ft2">Requirement</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr0 td1"><P class="p5 ft2">One Time Passwords</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr1 td2"><P class="p6 ft3">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr1 td3"><P class="p6 ft3">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr2 td4"><P class="p4 ft2">Description</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr2 td5"><P class="p5 ft4">An One Time Password (OTP) must only be valid once per context. A context</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr3 td4"><P class="p6 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr3 td5"><P class="p5 ft4">is a combination of a subject (e.g. an account), action (e.g. logon or reset),</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr3 td4"><P class="p6 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr3 td5"><P class="p5 ft4">resource (e.g. particular service interface) and its validity period. An OTP must</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr3 td4"><P class="p6 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr3 td5"><P class="p5 ft4">at least be 6 characters long with a validity period less than 15 minutes.</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr1 td2"><P class="p6 ft3">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr1 td6"><P class="p6 ft3">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr2 td4"><P class="p4 ft2">Supplement</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr2 td7"><P class="p5 ft4">An OTP is a temporary code that can be used as a value for a second factor.</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td2"><P class="p6 ft6">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td3"><P class="p6 ft6">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr0 td4"><P class="p4 ft2">ID</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr0 td5"><P class="p5 ft4"><NOBR>KSP-RE-251</NOBR></P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td2"><P class="p6 ft6">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td6"><P class="p6 ft6">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr2 td4"><P class="p4 ft2">Version</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr2 td7"><P class="p5 ft4">1.1</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr1 td2"><P class="p6 ft3">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr1 td3"><P class="p6 ft3">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr2 td4"><P class="p4 ft2">Date</P></TD>

	<TD class="tr0 td1"><P class="p5 ft2">Hide password on screen</P></TD>

	<TD class="tr3 td5"><P class="p5 ft4">prevent cracking hashed password using “rainbow tables‿).</P></TD>

	<TD class="tr3 td5"><P class="p5 ft4"><NOBR>(KSP-RA-227).</NOBR></P></TD>

<TR>
	<TD class="tr6 td4"><P class="p6 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>

</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr3 td4"><P class="p6 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>

</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr3 td4"><P class="p6 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>

</TR>
<TR>

	<TD class="tr0 td0"><P class="p4 ft2">Requirement</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr0 td1"><P class="p5 ft2">Password reset procedure for applications</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr1 td2"><P class="p6 ft3">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr1 td3"><P class="p6 ft3">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr2 td4"><P class="p4 ft2">Description</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr2 td5"><P class="p5 ft4">In case of a forgotten application password, the password must be reset and</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr3 td4"><P class="p6 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr3 td5"><P class="p5 ft4">sent to the user’s already known (corporate) <NOBR>e-mail</NOBR> address or mobile phone</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr3 td4"><P class="p6 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr3 td5"><P class="p5 ft4">number.</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr6 td4"><P class="p6 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr6 td5"><P class="p5 ft4">An alternative is to send a <NOBR>reset-token</NOBR> or URL with embedded <NOBR>reset-token</NOBR> to</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr3 td4"><P class="p6 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr3 td5"><P class="p5 ft4">guide the user through the <NOBR>reset-functionality</NOBR> process.</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr6 td4"><P class="p6 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr6 td5"><P class="p5 ft4">After receiving a password reset the user must change this password.</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr6 td4"><P class="p6 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr6 td5"><P class="p5 ft4">The replied temporary password or token must have a limited lifetime but must</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr3 td4"><P class="p6 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr3 td5"><P class="p5 ft4">never exceed 24 hours. A good limit is a maximum of 15 minutes validity time.</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr6 td4"><P class="p6 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr6 td5"><P class="p5 ft4">When two factor authentication is part of the account, access to a system must</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr3 td4"><P class="p6 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr3 td5"><P class="p5 ft4">be (re)established using two factor authentication as part of the obligatory</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr3 td4"><P class="p6 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr3 td5"><P class="p5 ft4">password reset.</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr6 td4"><P class="p6 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr6 td5"><P class="p5 ft4">All sessions or session tokens must be reset and a user must <NOBR>re-authenticate</NOBR></P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr3 td4"><P class="p6 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr3 td5"><P class="p5 ft4">before having access to the respective system or application.</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr1 td2"><P class="p6 ft3">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr1 td6"><P class="p6 ft3">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr2 td4"><P class="p4 ft2">Supplement</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr2 td7"><P class="p5 ft4">A strong reset process is required to prevent possible abuse when a users</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr3 td4"><P class="p6 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr3 td7"><P class="p5 ft4">credentials have been compromised for whatever reason.</P></TD>

	<TD class="tr4 td3"><P class="p6 ft6">&nbsp;</P></TD>

	<TD class="tr3 td5"><P class="p5 ft4">identify the user by information not published on the intranet, nor by public</P></TD>

<TR>
	<TD class="tr3 td4"><P class="p6 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr3 td5"><P class="p5 ft4">by sending an <NOBR>e-mail</NOBR> (when still accessible) or sending an SMS with an OTP.</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>

	<TD class="tr3 td5"><P class="p5 ft4">The user can prove his ownership to an account by exchanging the requested</P></TD>

<TR>
	<TD class="tr3 td4"><P class="p6 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr3 td5"><P class="p5 ft4">information from this message to the helpdesk employee.</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr6 td4"><P class="p6 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr6 td5"><P class="p5 ft4">The user must be informed by sending an <NOBR>e-mail,</NOBR> SMS or both to indicate that</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr3 td4"><P class="p6 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>

	<TD class="tr3 td4"><P class="p6 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr3 td5"><P class="p5 ft4">terminal or helpdesk.</P></TD>

<TABLE cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 class="t3">

	<TD class="tr7 td12"><P class="p6 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr7 td16"><P class="p8 ft4">For</P></TD>
</TR>

	<TD class="tr8 td12"><P class="p6 ft7">&nbsp;</P></TD>

</TR>

	<TD class="tr3 td12"><P class="p6 ft5">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr3 td16"><P class="p7 ft4">password age) should be enforced.</P></TD>
